page.title: 07THE POST OFFICE
page.content: {The Post Office }sells stamps and takes parcels. They have facilities for {Bank Accounts. In the shop they sell general groceries, green grocery, meat, bread, cakes, dairy produce, toys, stationery, hardware, cigareetes, tobacco, wines and spirits, newspapers, sweets, and toiletries. The{stock is delivered every 2 weeks. {Eight staff are employed. }They have special training to work on the P.O. side but they are paid the same as staff who work in the shop side. Mrs. Cox is kept busy looking after the shop, the P.O. and her family. No-one is quite sure how old the P.O. is but they think it is around 200 years old. {They have never been burgled since {Mrs.Cox has been there.
